job.title: Machine Learning Engineer - Computer Vision Retail Engineering
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brAre you passionate about designing simple software solutions to seek sophisticated tasks We are looking for someone who thrives on collaboration and wants to push the boundaries of what is possible todaybrbrbrJoin our team of driven and dedicated software engineers in the Retail Apps Engineering team in Austin We build software and hardware solutions that power the worldwide fleet of Apple Retail locations As a member of the group you will develop ML solutions for exciting new technologies that drive toplevel customer and employee experiences in our storesbrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong brExcellent collaboration and interpersonal skills Excellent software design problem solving and debugging skills Excellent understanding of data structures and algorithms Expertise in Python TensorFlowKeras with familiarity of PyTorch Solid mathematical foundation in linear algebra Solid experience with graph data structures and algorithms Solid knowledge of GPU brbrConsistent  track record of successfully  shipping Projectsbrbr Strong interest in latest Machine Learning Researchbrbr Experience with object detection andor multiobject tracking is a plusbrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brDemonstrate your experience in order to help us deliver a oneofakind product within Apple You will work on a highly focused team which is developing an innovative Privacyconscious computer vision and machine learning system for Apple Retail worldwide You will collaborate crossfunctionally with various disciplines including our deep learning and computer vision algorithm engineers to build software solutions for Apples groundbreaking retail experiencebrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brMasters or Bachelors in Computer Science or similar and 3 years of proven experiencebrbr brRole Number 200275673brbr
